pr_title: (CDAP-16324) Support macro for Joiner, Dedup and Distinct transform fields

timeline.author: CuriousVini

timeline.bodyText:
nit: indentation
Please import the settings jar and format the code.
timeline.author: CuriousVini
CuriousVini

replies.bodyText: It's needed to handle validation failures in join key validation failures.
replies.author: rmstar

timeline.bodyText: does getOutputSchema handle null join keys and other configs?
timeline.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText:
Yes.
null join keys (configured by macro) is handled by JoinerConfig.validateJoinKeySchemas().
JoinerConfig.getInputs() returns empty set when requiredInputs is null.
getOutputSchema returns null if selectedFields is null.
replies.author: rmstar

timeline.author: CuriousVini

timeline.bodyText: are nulls handled for both the macro properties?
timeline.author: CuriousVini
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +54,7 @@

     "group of 'duplicate' records.")
   @Nullable
+  @Macro

timeline.message: (CDAP-16324) Support macro for Joiner, dedupe and distinct transform fields
